content.rendered:
Directed by Susanne Bier.

Written by Aaron Cooley. Aaron Cooley. Aaron Cooley. Aaron Cooley. Azia Squire. Azia Squire. Azia Squire. Ellen Fairey. Ellen Fairey. Abby Ajayi. Abby Ajayi. Zora Bikangaga. Zora Bikangaga. Jennifer Westfeldt. Jennifer Westfeldt. Hunt Baldwin. Hunt Baldwin.

Cast Michelle Pfeiffer (Betty Ford 1). Gillian Anderson (Eleanor Roosevelt 1). O-T Fagbenle (Barack Obama 1). Dakota Fanning (Susan Elizabeth Ford 1). Lily Rabe (Lorena Hickock 1). Regina Taylor (Marian Robinson 1). Kiefer Sutherland (Franklin D. Roosevelt 1). Aaron Eckhart (Gerald Ford 1). Clea DuVall (Tommy). Evan Parke (Secret Service Agent Allen Taylor). Jayme Lawson (Young Michelle Obama). Cailee Spaeny (Anna Eleanor Roosevelt). Michael Potts (Fraser Robinson). Ellen Burstyn (Sara Delano Roosevelt). Donna Lynne Champlin (Mel Winter). Kristine Froseth (Young Betty Ford). Jackie Earle Haley (Louis Howe).

Language English.

Producers Abby Ajayi. Susanne Bier. Zora Bikangaga. Ellen Fairey. Pavlina Hatoupis. Nina Khan. J.B. Popplewell. DeAnn Heline. Eileen Heisler. Sarah Finn. Cathy Schulman. Matthew Tinker. Mark Cotone. Jason Babiszewski. Aaron Cooley. Andrew Wang. Hunt Baldwin.

Production Showtime Networks. Lionsgate. Welle Entertainment.

No. of Seasons 1

No. of Episodes 10

Status Finished (4)
